step_feedback.feedback: Good job placing hands on your abdomen. Try to keep your shoulders and elbows a bit more stable.
Well done with this step. Focus on keeping your wrists steadier as you inhale.
Excellent muscle tightening and visualization during your inhale. Keep your wrists a little more still.
Great job relaxing your muscles and visualizing fluid release. Try to keep your wrists and elbows more stable during the exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with deep breathing to help your lymphatic system. Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight as you inhale and relax them as you exhale. This helps move fluid effectively.
